TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyTranslator(object host, string propertyName, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTranslator extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The host control whose property is being mapped. The host control is either a or an .
The name of the property being translated.
The new value of the property.
Docs.summary: Provides a translation function for a mapped property of the host control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The PropertyTranslator delegate is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap> class to implement property mapping between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
